table.name: Document
table.description: This table stores information about all the documents that are currently stored with and being managed by the application. The actual contents of the documents are stored in files on the server and can be displayed on the client's browser by the application.

column.name: document_id
column.descr: Unique Document ID for each document record stored in this table

column.name: md5_hash_id
column.descr: The value of the 128-bit unique message digest (MD5) hash that can be used to verify the authenticity of the contents of the document

column.name: document_type_id
column.descr: What kind of document is this?

column.name: mime_type_id
column.descr: The mime-type to be sent to the browser when displaying this document

column.name: mime_type
column.descr: The value of the mime-type if choosing 'Other' in the field above

column.name: creator_id
column.descr: The ID of the person who created this document. No org_id is necessary since it is inferred

column.name: document_descr
column.descr: A brief description of the contents of the document

column.name: doc_creation_time
column.descr: The exact time when this document was first created

column.name: doc_modification_time
column.descr: The last time this document was modified

column.name: local_filename
column.descr: The filename on the server where the contents of this document are stored.
